name: Pico8
short: Creates pictures and gifs out of PICO-8 code
description: Runs PICO-8 code and generates gifs or pictures out of the output. Also provides some facilities for adding transparency and other simple editing features.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
You've installed the PICO-8 cog! Time to gif it up with some PICO-8 code!

Before using this cog you'll need to upload a copy of PICO-8 to your bot. You can find out how by using [p]pico8install.

Make sure to check out the help ([p]help p8gif), there's lots of options you can use in your PICO-8 code :)
author: chovin (irdumb)
